recipe.title: Gazpacho with Croutons and Sausage
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups 3/4-inch cubes day-old French or Italian bread
4 ounces fully cooked smoked sausage (such as linguiça or hot links), cut into 3/4-inch pieces
instructions: Mash garlic and salt in mortar with pestle until paste forms. Transfer to large bowl. Finely chop tomatoes, bell pepper and cucumber and add to bowl. Add 2 cups cold water, vinegar and 2 tablespoons oil. Stir in chopped cilantro. Season with pepper. Cover soup and refrigerate until cold, about 3 hours. Heat 2 tablespoons oil in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat. Add bread; sauté until golden, about 12 minutes. Season croutons with salt. Cool. Serve soup with croutons and sausage.
